summary:
- Specialist in business development in China: combines PhD Lit. (the history of the adaption of Western grammar in China [1899 - 1956]) and PhD Business Administration (a new organization theory  applied to cases of Sino-foreign joint ventures);
- Leading scholar in Chinese corporate culture & identity (main publication: Peverelli, P.J. (2006) Chinese Corporate Identity, London: Routledge) and Chinese entrepreneurship.

Specialties: Negotiating cooperation agreements between Western and Chinese parties bases on true mutual understanding and respect.

Experience in the Chinese food industry, in particular the ingredients market, from 1985 to present.

treasury_media.description: This book provides in depth insight in what makes China the world's largest emerging economy.
